DOCU_Docu.DOC:
With the HP-Unix action you can install, upgrade, remove and query installed packages on your UNIX host.
The actions are in general wrappers around the swinstall, swremove and swlist command line tools.
=Rollback=
The actions getting some system information don't need rollbacks, because they do not change the state of your system. Such a method is QUERY.
Actions potentially changing the state of your system (INSTALL, REMOVE) do not have rollbacks defined yet.
